content.title: ChatGPT - Q2 Extractor
content.visibleText:
- Emails to improve their persuasiveness.
- Dragos and Greg at Firat advised prioritizing direct, personal interactions with customers to gather better insights.

What ideas or suggestions did Dragos have with respect to the following topics or subjects:
- Messenger: Emphasized informing teams about updates to improve communication and support.
- Monitor: Not explicitly mentioned in this transcript.
- Advocates: Suggested using tailored prompts for Copilot to help customers ask better questions and improve interaction.
- Postponed: Emphasized the importance of clear communication and understanding customer needs for effective engagement.
- Influitive: Discussed the need to understand customer problems and engage in early feedback to ensure features meet user needs.
- Jive: Emphasized the importance of clear and useful communication strategies for Jive's co-pilot feature.
- Co-pilot: Emphasized the need for tailored prompts and iterative feedback to improve the Co-pilot feature and its communication. Suggested focusing on improving the summarize feature to make it more relevant to different document types.
